text:
Hi fellow developers! I'm stuck on a fairly simple "create a new note in a deal" API call.

The error I get is; "invalid from object type 0-46 for associations to be created. expected: 0-2"

I guess i'm using the wrong association id but I can seem to figure out the correct one: tried 2, 213, ...

Any help would be much appreciated! :pray:
I believe "0-1" is Contacts, "0-2" is Companies, "0-3" is deals, not sure that is what you are looking for
Really weird that there is nothing mentioned in the documentation about this type of notation
